Articles.Content:
[http://imgur.com/a/r718k](http://imgur.com/a/r718k)

I still cant believe I got this to work.

Ive attached the .craft file! Enjoy!

Concept and design is pretty awesome. I downloaded, but unfortunately it explodes before taking off. I\'m slightly new, but I know that can happen whenever one item attached to another exceeds a certain weigh capacity, but why did it happen with this download if it worked for you? Sorry if it\'s a stupid question, I\'d just really like to fly it!
Over 9000 points for pure style. Well done, and welcome to KSP!

> 
> Concept and design is pretty awesome. I downloaded, but unfortunately it explodes before taking off. I\'m slightly new, but I know that can happen whenever one item attached to another exceeds a certain weigh capacity, but why did it happen with this download if it worked for you? Sorry if it\'s a stupid question, I\'d just really like to fly it!

before the game got it\'s new \'land\' as im gonna call it the dark side of the planet was not stable which means anything landing there would explode, even the pod, a little bit of that bug still exists so you would need to get the time of day perfect for it not to break, i got it right about when the mun was 45 degrees up from the launchpad facing the water and it worked for me

I love this thing.

I\'d bet that if one were to handle his fuel well, you could use it to deploy six or seven MechJeb landers on either the Mun or Minmus. Maybe both.

> 
> Concept and design is pretty awesome. I downloaded, but unfortunately it explodes before taking off. I\'m slightly new, but I know that can happen whenever one item attached to another exceeds a certain weigh capacity, but why did it happen with this download if it worked for you? Sorry if it\'s a stupid question, I\'d just really like to fly it!

Same here. I think I just had a small heartattack...
